name: seductive
content:
seductive adjective
(PERSUADING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
intended to seduce someone: It was a seductive black evening dress. She gave him a seductive look.
seductive adjective
(ATTRACTING)
making you want to do, have, or believe something, because of seeming attractive: Television confronts the viewer with a succession of glittering and seductive images. The argument that sanctions should be given more time to work is seductive but fatally flawed.
